Review_Text: A nice portrait of a connection between a great director and , for some time, his fetiche actor. Not exactly revelations but a seductive film about a form of friendship, trust, a Pygmallion and an ambitious young man looking for, having succes, to, for an American career .Tender and sentimental, an useful chronicle for understand the saisons of a relation, reminding titles and reflecting roots of projects and decisions, it is a honest documentary and beautiful eulogy to a work together with not so bad results.Reflecting the development of what represents, today, Antonio Banderas, it is a nice confirmation about familiar traits of Pedro Almodovar.
